recipe.title: Corn Chowder

ingredientlist.ingredient: 4 ears of corn kernels cut from the cob

recipe.preparation:
Heat butter in a 3-quart saucepan. Add onion, garlic, celery, red pepper and corn. Sweat vegetables over medium-low heat until onion is translucent.

Add flour to thicken the mixture. Stir often. Add broth and potatoes and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 30 minutes. Stir in milk.

Add salt and pepper to taste.
recipe.serving: Serve with homemade biscuits or bread.
